My Process

All My Assignments take careful planning before the can be put into action to produce desired result.

1

Discuss the assignment

I talk with you to figure out what needs to get done, where, and when. *Questions may be asked; whether offer is accepted or not, no word of your assignment will get out.

2

Brainstorming/Research

I research into your subject and think about every possible solution to accomplish the goal.(Working with others is acceptable)

3

Planning

I start reaching out to connections and set up everything I would need. (Fake IDs, plane tickets, sending event invitations, gathering help, ect.)

4

Initition

I start working. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet. *Depending on your assignment, this could take days, weeks, or months.
